usefulItems: mini muffin tray (24 holes), wire rack, airtight container, oven
title: Carrot, Apple and Chia Muffin Bites

ingredients.content: ½ - 1 tsp fine sea salt, to taste

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 200°C. Grease 2 x 24-hole mini-muffin trays.
Place carrots and apples in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add plain flour, wholemeal flour and sugar then mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add milk, oil and eggs then blend <b>15 sec/speed 5<b>.

Add chia seeds, baking powder, cinnamon and salt then mix <b>15 sec/speed 3<b>. Pour into prepared muffin trays. Bake for 12-15 minutes (200°C) until risen and golden. Leave in trays for 5 minutes then remove to a wire rack to cool completely.
Store in an airtight container (can also be frozen). Eat within 3 days.

hintsAndTricks: Top with a cream cheese icing.
Use mixture to make larger muffins if preferred.
